title: Community Bond - CRM for SME's
description: Connecting all things local. Empowering local businesses & communities to increase loyalty on a digital platform using virtual coins.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposers have a social business product they want to build and have added a document to the attachments. They have submitted the same thing into 6 categories, all with the same limited information and most with the same text. Please apply with a project which explains how your product fits with Cardano and how it addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: There is no plan on what will actually be made and how it will help scale up Community hubs.. Please provide a project plan on what you will produce and what the funds will be used for.
f6_assessments.q2: There is no detailed plan of what the funds will be used to produce which can be assessed against. Thus progress and success cannot be measured. It is not clear what, if anything has already been built.

f6_assessments.q0: I love the idea of this proposal. Love connecting it with local businesses as a goal. I love that invites can be provided by peers to join and share an experience.  Wondering if there is a way for people rate experiences only if there is verification of services being provided. I suggest this because platforms like yelp and tripadvisor do not really verify user interaction with businesses they are reviewing. Also, how do businesses trend on the app? How do people receive notifications about those trends.
f6_assessments.q1: The linked business proposal is very good.
f6_assessments.q2: I think more information needs to be provided in order to audit the success of this project.  There do not seem to be enough metrics provided.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal did no address effectivel the challenge. There is not enough informations describing a clea project.
f6_assessments.q1: Since this proposal doesn't contain a clear project, there is way to evaluate its implementation.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal doesn't provide any KPI nor does it have a clear project. I suggest to the proposer to add more informations to the proposal. It may be a good proposal with enough details.

f6_assessments.q0: As the other community bond related proposals, this proposal is very short and unfinished. While as opposed to the other sub proposals this has a presentation attached, an action plan is still missing.
f6_assessments.q1: A relatively detailed concept is presented in the presentation and on the website. The proposers could add more infos about themselves and their skills. A proper roadmap is missing. The big amount of unfinished proposals by this proposer make it doubtable whether they are up to the challenge.
f6_assessments.q2: The pitch is missing clear milestones to help audit the proposals. The connection to the Cardano community hubs needs to be explained better.

solution: SME's and local businesses have limited resources, skills and time to manage their customer loyalty and marketing. Bond automates that.
experience: \+ 15 years in startups, platforms and marketplaces. Social media and other international marketing experience.
